title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. In a separate pan, fry the pancetta. Beat the eggs with cheese and pepper. Combine all ingredients together off the heat to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka masala paste. Grill the chicken. Cook onions and add tomato puree. Combine grilled chicken with the sauce, and simmer. Finish with cream and coriander.
